job.title: Data Scientist (remote)
job.description: vroom is an innovative endtoend ecommerce company that is revolutionizing the car buying experience our scalable datadriven technology brings all phases of the vehicle buying and selling process to consumers wherever they are and offers an extensive selection of vehicles transparent pricing competitive financing and contactfree athome pickup and delivery we have experienced tremendous growth and have become a disruptive force in the automotive industry vroom is an exciting dynamic workplace and theres no better time to join the team than right nowltbrgtltbrgtjoin our pit crew of talented data experts transforming the auto sales industry we are looking for a fulltime data scientist to join our data science team and guide vrooms pricing both for purchasing and retailing accurate pricing and forecasting are paramount to vrooms success so we need driven data scientists continuously creating and improving modelsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtresponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtengage with stakeholders to find opportunities understand requirements and translate those requirements into mathematical modelsltligtltligttrain test track productionize and improve modelsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtqualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtexperience with gathering data cleaning data visualizing data and modeling dataltligtltligtexperience with working with stakeholders to identify situations where a mathematical model would be appropriate gathering data for training the model training the model testing the model and preparing the model for production useltligtltligtexperience with a machine learning platform like tensorflow or pytorchltligtltligtpython rltligtltligtjupyter notebooksltligtltligtawsltligtltligtsagemakerltligtltligtsqlltligtltligtsparkltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugteducation and experienceltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtrequires a minimum of years of related experience with a bachelors degree or years and a masters degree or a phd without experience or equivalent work experienceltbrgtltligtltulgtwe value your personal growth and will gladly train you on any of our technologies that you dont currently have ours is a culture where your voice will be heard and youll be able to see the result of your workltbrgtltbrgtwere one competitive compensation health dental and vision insurance a k plan fully companypaid short term disability long term disability and life insurance access to a healthcare concierge service with virtual visits and annualized days of paid vacationltbrgtltbrgtbut our biggest benefit is being part of a lowego high performing team thats transforming the used car market into a modern online and datadriven industry we are looking for people who want to be a part of a contemporary startup culture what gets us out of bed is working with talented people on a mission that mattersltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtcommitment to diversity and equal employment opportunityltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtvroom is an equal opportunity employer that is committed to creating a work environment where
